home.aboutText: Hello! I'm a 23-year-old Full Stack Developer. I create modern, accessible, and performant web applications using Next.js and React.

about.title: About me
aboutParagraphs: ~ When bringing your web projects to life, I don't just write code‚ÄîI create your brand's digital identity. Using modern web technologies, I craft unforgettable experiences for your users.

~ Projects I develop with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS not only rank high on Google but also convert your visitors into customers. Animations powered by GSAP and Three.js set your site apart from competitors.
~ Every project comes with guaranteed fast loading times, mobile responsiveness, and SEO optimization. With Firebase and MongoDB integrations, I deliver dynamic and scalable solutions.
~ I offer you not just a website, but a digital platform to grow your business. With my proactive approach and quick learning ability, I'm by your side through every stage of your project.
~ With clean code, modern technologies, and user-centered design, your website won't just look beautiful‚Äîit will deliver results.

quote.text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work
quote.author: Thomas Edison

projects.title: LocaFit Studio Website

projects.title: Real-time Chat App
projects.description: Modern chat application offering real-time messaging with a sleek interface. Powered by Firebase for reliable and fast communication.

projects.title: Apple.com clone
projects.description: Pixel-perfect clone of Apple's website, featuring immersive animations with GSAP and Three.js for a premium user experience.

projects.description: Minimalist replica of Amazon's website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, focusing on essential design and features.

projects.title: Starbucks.com.tr clone
projects.description: Polished replica of Starbucks Turkey's website built with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap for a seamless browsing experience.

projects.title: New Design
projects.description: Sleek web design project combining modern aesthetics with user-centered functionality for an impressive digital experience.

projects.title: Smart Kitchen Assistant
projects.description: AI-powered assistant that suggests smart recipes based on selected ingredients, making life easier in the kitchen.

projects.title: Giftify
projects.description: A creative platform that allows users to design personalized gift cards with style.

projects.title: GameSounds
projects.description: Modern web app that generates unique sound effects for games using ElevenLabs AI.

projects.title: QR Menu Platform
projects.description: Practical platform enabling restaurants to create customizable and fast QR menus.

testimonials.title: What Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take my word for it

items.name: LocaFit Studio
items.comment: Volkan created a modern and user-friendly website for our gym. The design perfectly represents our brand and our members love it!

items.name: Tech Startup
items.comment: Fast, reliable, and professional. Volkan delivered our chat application on time with excellent code quality.

items.name: Restaurant Owner
items.comment: The QR menu platform is exactly what we needed. Easy to use and our customers appreciate the modern approach.
